page.title: 14PUBS IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: The {landlord's day} starts at 07.45 when he gets up to let in the cleaners.Then he gets breakfast ready for the guests (the inn is popular,standing at the A46 and A417 junction).The next tasks are book-keeping,banking,checking the bar and wine cellar. The chef then arrives;the menu and food are selected-by now the time has reached midday.The bars are open now and the landlord does a spell of duty. The pub closes at 14.45. The pub reopens at 17.45 and early evening is a busy period.The landlord visits the bars,kitchen and restaurant helping out.When the public house closes just after 23.00,the landlord checks the money and makes certain that everything is tidy.Only then is his day usually finished.
